data.name: DocumentSettings
desc: describes properties that apply to the whole spreadsheet document.

For settings that affect view properties, these settings apply to subsequently created views and are saved with the document, while SpreadsheetViewSettings can be used to alter a specific view that is already open.

properties.name: GridColor
desc: specifies the color in which the cell grid is displayed.

properties.name: HasColumnRowHeaders
desc: enables the column and row headers of the view.

properties.name: HasSheetTabs
desc: enables the sheet tabs of the view.

properties.name: IsDocumentShared
desc: enables the document sharing feature (Tools->Share Spreadsheet)

properties.name: IsOutlineSymbolsSet
desc: enables the display of outline symbols.

properties.name: IsRasterAxisSynchronized
desc: enables the synchronization of horizontal and vertical grid settings in the user interface.

properties.name: IsSnapToRaster
desc: enables the restriction of object movement and resizing of drawing objects to the raster.

properties.name: RasterIsVisible
desc: enables the display of the drawing object raster.

properties.name: RasterResolutionX
desc: specifies the distance between horizontal grid elements in 1/100 mm.

properties.name: RasterResolutionY
desc: specifies the distance between vertical grid elements in 1/100 mm.

properties.name: RasterSubdivisionX
desc: specifies the number of subdivisions between two horizontal grid elements.

properties.name: RasterSubdivisionY
desc: specifies the number of subdivisions between two vertical grid elements.

properties.name: ShowGrid
desc: enables the display of the cell grid.

properties.name: ShowNotes
desc: controls whether a marker is shown for notes in cells.
